nodes.label: HCV Cirrhosis with ascites and HE
Bipolar affective disorder, currently manic, mild, and PTSD
History of cocaine and heroin use
Albuterol Inhaler 2 PUFF IH Q6H:PRN wheezing, SOB

edges.label: has symptom
edges.detailed_description: The patient is experiencing abdominal fullness and discomfort.
edges.facts_and_info: Abdominal fullness and discomfort are the primary symptoms.

edges.label: has diagnosis
edges.detailed_description: The patient has been diagnosed with HCV Cirrhosis with ascites and HE.
edges.facts_and_info: HCV Cirrhosis is a liver disease caused by the hepatitis C virus.

edges.label: has diagnosis
edges.detailed_description: The patient has been diagnosed with diuretic refractory ascites.
edges.facts_and_info: Diuretic refractory ascites is a condition where the body does not respond to diuretics.

edges.label: has diagnosis
edges.detailed_description: The patient has been diagnosed with HIV on HAART.
edges.facts_and_info: HIV is a viral infection that attacks the body's immune system.

edges.label: has diagnosis
edges.detailed_description: The patient has been diagnosed with COPD.
edges.facts_and_info: COPD is a lung disease that makes it difficult to breathe.

edges.label: has diagnosis
edges.detailed_description: The patient has been diagnosed with bipolar affective disorder, currently manic, mild, and PTSD.
edges.facts_and_info: Bipolar affective disorder is a mental health condition that affects mood.

edges.label: has history of
edges.detailed_description: The patient has a history of cocaine and heroin use.
edges.facts_and_info: Cocaine and heroin are illicit substances that can have negative effects on the body.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: Abdominal fullness and discomfort are being managed using Albuterol Inhaler.
edges.facts_and_info: Albuterol is a medication used to treat wheezing and shortness of breath.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: Abdominal fullness and discomfort are being managed using (Truvada).
edges.facts_and_info: (Truvada) is a medication used to treat HIV.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: HCV Cirrhosis with ascites and HE is being managed using Furosemide.
edges.facts_and_info: Furosemide is a diuretic used to treat fluid retention.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: HCV Cirrhosis with ascites and HE is being managed using Raltegravir.
edges.facts_and_info: Raltegravir is a medication used to treat HIV.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: Diuretic refractory ascites is being managed using Spironolactone.
edges.facts_and_info: Spironolactone is a diuretic used to treat fluid retention.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: HIV on HAART is being managed using Acetaminophen.
edges.facts_and_info: Acetaminophen is a medication used to treat pain and fever.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: COPD is being managed using Tiotropium Bromide.
edges.facts_and_info: Tiotropium is a medication used to treat COPD.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: Bipolar affective disorder, currently manic, mild, and PTSD is being managed using Rifaximin.
edges.facts_and_info: Rifaximin is a medication used to treat mental health conditions.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: History of cocaine and heroin use is being managed using Calcium Carbonate.
edges.facts_and_info: Calcium carbonate is a medication used to treat addiction.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: Albuterol Inhaler is being managed using Lactulose.
edges.facts_and_info: Lactulose is a medication used to treat constipation.

edges.label: treated with
edges.detailed_description: (Truvada) is being managed using Sulfameth/Trimethoprim DS.
edges.facts_and_info: Sulfameth/Trimethoprim is a medication used to treat infections.
